content.raw:
The error seems to be 
~~~
gazebo_physics.lib(MultiRayShape.cc.obj) : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static class ignition::math::Angle const ignition::math::Angle::Zero" (?Zero@Angle@math@ignition@@2V123@B) 
~~~
It should have been fixed by https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/164/change-name-to-the-generic-building_dll/diff , but perhaps the ignition-math used for the build is not updated. 
See #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2262/symbol-visibility-issues-in-windows for a more general discussion on the problem, and the related PR : #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2700/remove-preprocessor-definition-of/diff .
content.html:
The error seems to be 

gazebo_physics.lib(MultiRayShape.cc.obj) : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static class ignition::math::Angle const ignition::math::Angle::Zero" (?Zero@Angle@math@ignition@@2V123@B)

It should have been fixed by https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/164/change-name-to-the-generic-building_dll/diff , but perhaps the ignition-math used for the build is not updated. See #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2262/symbol-visibility-issues-in-windows for a more general discussion on the problem, and the related PR : #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2700/remove-preprocessor-definition-of/diff .
